p: Compounds 11e–g turned out to be either mixed or non-competitive inhibitors, as evidenced by the Cornish–Bowden plots. This means that the title compound can bind either the free enzyme ( K ia) or the complex enzyme-substrate ( K ib). In order to illustrate this issue, Cornish–Bowden plots for derivative 11e against BuChE (mixed inhibition) are depicted in Figure 2.
